article: Mondays are usually pretty busy for me. On one of these  _  Mondays, I got ready to go to work thinking about all the things I had to  _  on that day and walked down to get to my car scolding myself for being late to work, but  _  the car was nowhere to be found. I made  _  to all the towing places, police stations all the time thinking that it was towed by  _  . By around 10:00 am, I couldn't find it anywhere and the policemen decided that it was  _  stolen. Later in the day I went to pick up a rental car at an enterprise  _  to realize that my license was missing too along with my car.
